XXadsp70-u:1354: atha āyuṣṃata subhūter etad abhūt: katamaḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayam īdṛśaḥ sannāhaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1356: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva cetaḥ paṅvitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: ṣaṭpāramitā subhūte bodhisattvasya
XXadsp70-u:1357: mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ, saptatṛṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni caturdaśaśūnyatā aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni. yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā, api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā bodhisattvasya
XXadsp70-u:1358: mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte asti kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ, yatra śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1359: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta? nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ. aśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaktaḥ sarākārajñātām anuprāptuṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1360: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā śūnyā. kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1361: sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate? na nu bhagavann aprapaṃcyaṃ prapaṃcayeti. iyanta iti vā ima iti vā, ime dharmā laukikā ime lokottarā. evaṃ sāsravā vā
XXadsp70-u:1362: anāsravā vā. saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā. pṛthagjanadharmā vā yāvad
XXadsp70-u:1363: arhandharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā.
XXadsp70-u:1364: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ. yadi punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na abhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata: yasmāt tarhi subhūte
XXadsp70-u:1366: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. api tu khalu subhūte tad evaṃ vadasi:
XXadsp70-u:1367: yadi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanānātvaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1368: karoti. iyanta iti vā ima iti vā yāvat pṛthagjanadharmā vā yāvad arhaddharmā vā. pratyekabuddhadharmā vā. (AdSPG II 99) buddhadharmā vā.
XXadsp70-u:1369: iti. tat kaccit punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānaṃti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā
XXadsp70-u:1370: iti. yadi jānīyur nai [f. 296a] va bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. yasmāt tarhi subhūte ete sattvā na
XXadsp70-u:1371: jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1372: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvadharmavyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati.
XXadsp70-u:1373: (VIII 5,13) tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā
XXadsp70-u:1374: prathamata eva evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ. na atra kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena upalabhyate. anyatra abhisaṃskārāt. tatra evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam
XXadsp70-u:1375: upaparīkṣeta. upaparīkṣya na kvacid abhiniviśate. yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yadi vā srotaāpattiphale. yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vā anāgāmiphale yadi vā arhattve yadi vā
XXadsp70-u:1376: pratyekabodhau yadi vā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1377: tathā hi svabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā, na hi śūnyatāyā śūnyatāyām
XXadsp70-u:1378: abhiniviśate. śūnyataiva tāvan nopalabhate. prāg eva yaḥ śūnyatāyām
XXadsp70-u:1379: abhinivekṣyate. evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viharati. yatra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā sarvāś caryā avalokayati
XXadsp70-u:1380: kveme sattvāś caraṃti asadgrāhe, tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1381: bhavati, sumocyā vateme sattvā asadgrāhād iti. tatopāyakauśalena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evam avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā dānaṃ dadadhvaṃ. tad yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati. bhogaiḥ, taiś ca bhogair mā
XXadsp70-u:1382: maṃsyadhve, na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ śīle avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣata. tena ca śīlena mā maṃsyadhve. na tatra kiṃcit
XXadsp70-u:1383: sāram asti. evaṃ kṣāntau vīrye samādhāv avavadati eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā
XXadsp70-u:1384: samādhiṃ samāpadyadhvaṃ. tena samādhinā mā maṃsyadhve, na tatra kinicit
XXadsp70-u:1385: sāram asti. evaṃ prajñāyām avavadati. eta (AdSPG II 100) bhoḥ sattvāḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ, tayā ca prajñayā mā maṃsyadhve, na tatra kiṃcit sāram
XXadsp70-u:1386: asti. evaṃ srotaāpattiphale evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale evam anāgāmiphale evam arhattve evaṃ pratyekabodhau evaṃ buddhadharmeṣv avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ
XXadsp70-u:1387: sattvāḥ buddhadharmāṃ bhāvayataḥ, taiś ca buddhadharmair mā maṃsyadhve, na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. sa evam eva avavadann evam anuśāsan
XXadsp70-u:1388: bodhisattvamārge carati. na ca kvacit abhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1389: anabhiniviṣṭā hi sarvadharmā, tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yena
XXadsp70-u:1390: abhiniviśyeta. śūnyatāsvabhāvatām upādāya: tatra subhūte bodhisattvo
XXadsp70-u:1391: mahāsattvo bodhimārge caran na kvacit pratitiṣṭhati. so 'pratiṣṭhānayogena
XXadsp70-u:1392: dānapāramitāyāṃ carati. na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
XXadsp70-u:1393: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. sa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate na ca
XXadsp70-u:1394: tatra pratitiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānena śūnyaṃ yo 'pi samāpadyeta so 'pi śūnyaḥ yair apy ākāraiḥ samāpadyate. te
XXadsp70-u:1395: 'py ākārā śūnyā. evaṃ dvitīyam [f. 296b] tṛtīyaṃ caturtham evaṃ maitriṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upeksām ārūpyasamāpattīm aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ pratilabhate. na ca tatra
XXadsp70-u:1396: pratitiṣṭhati. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ pratilabhate. na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
XXadsp70-u:1397: anāgāmiphalaṃ pratilabhate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. arhattvaṃ pratilabhate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. pratyekabodhiṃ pratilabhate. na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
XXadsp70-u:1399: bhagavān āha: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ na pratitiṣṭhati. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ?
XXadsp70-u:1400: svabhāvaś ca teṣāṃ phalānāṃ nāsti yatra pratitiṣṭhet. yena vā pratitiṣṭhet. yo vā pratitiṣṭhet. na ca tanmātrakeṇa tuṣṭim āpadyate. na mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ na prāptavyaṃ. na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. yāvan na mayā arhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ. na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. na mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmir na prāptavyā, na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mayā
XXadsp70-u:1401: prathamacittotpādam upādāya nānyaṃ cittaṃ pratilabdham anyatra anuttarasyā
XXadsp70-u:1402: samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya (AdSPG II 101) hetoḥ? tathā hi mayā prathamam bhūmim upādāya na anyaṃ cittam utpāditam anyatra anuttarasyā
XXadsp70-u:1403: samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ yāvad daśamī bhūmir yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam
XXadsp70-u:1404: avakrāntaḥ na anyaḥ kaści cittotpāda utpādito 'nyatra anuttarasyāḥ
XXadsp70-u:1405: samyaksaṃbodheḥ. avikṣiptamanasā, subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad eva kāyena parākramate. vācā manasā nānyatra bodhicittena, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicitte sthitvā avikṣiptama. nasā bodhimārgam utpādayati.
XXadsp70-u:1406: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā anutpannās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati?
XXadsp70-u:1407: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmā anutpannā, tat punaḥ katham iti. ye 'nābhisaṃskurvanti teṣāṃ sarvadharmā anutpannāḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1408: āha: na nu punar bhagavann utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā
XXadsp70-u:1410: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. utpādād vā tathāgatānām
XXadsp70-u:1411: anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇān dharmasthitiḥ, ye punar imāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1412: dharmasthitiṃ na jānanti teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati. yena bodhisattvamārgeṇa sattvān mocayati saṃsārāt.
XXadsp70-u:1413: (VIII 5,14) āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann utpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
XXadsp70-u:1415: āha: tad anutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
XXadsp70-u:1417: āha: tad utpannena anutpannena ca mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
XXadsp70-u:1419: āha: tan naivotpannena naivānutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
XXadsp70-u:1421: āha: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ. bodhiḥ prāpyate.
XXadsp70-u:1422: bhagavān āha: na subhūte mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate. na amārgeṇa. bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva
XXadsp70-u:1424: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhiḥ, tat prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhiḥ, tat kathaṃ tathāgato 'rhan
XXadsp70-u:1426: tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair
XXadsp70-u:1427: bhagavān āha: [f. 297a] tat kiṃ manyase subhūte buddho bodhiṃ prāpnoti?
XXadsp70-u:1428: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ, na buddho bodhiṃ prāpnoti. buddha eva bodhir
XXadsp70-u:1430: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha. tat prāptaiva bhavati
XXadsp70-u:1431: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhir iti. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya saptatṛṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyāṃ dharmān paripūrya
XXadsp70-u:1433: mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamena samādhinā ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajnayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1434: tadā tathāgata iti nirdiśyate. sarvadarśī sarvadharmavaśavartī.
XXadsp70-u:1435: (VIII 5,15) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati?
XXadsp70-u:1436: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya. kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ manodauṣṭulyam ātmanaś ca parasya ca
XXadsp70-u:1438: āha: katamad bhagavan kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, katamad vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ katamo
XXadsp70-u:1439: bhagavān āha: yat kāyakarmākuśalaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ ādattadānaṃ kāmamithyācāraḥ idaṃ kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yad vākkarmākuśalaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ, idaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. yan manaskarmākuśale abhidhyā
XXadsp70-u:1440: vyāpado mithyādṛṣṭi idaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ (AdSPG II 103) bodhisattvasya
XXadsp70-u:1441: mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yan matsaryacittam idaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya, yad dauśīlyacittaṃ kṣobhanācittaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1442: kausīdyacittaṃ vikṣepacittam asamahitacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam idam api manodauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chīlāpariśuddhim idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yac caturbhir smṛtyupasthānair virahita idam api dauṣṭulyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. evaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhi ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balai saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa. śūnyatāyāḥ samādhinā ānimittena samādhinā apraṇihitena samādhinā virahita idam api dauṣṭulyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte yat srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra
XXadsp70-u:1443: ca aspṛhaṇatā idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. evaṃ yāvad arhattve pratyekabodhau vā. spṛhaṇatā idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpasaṃjñā dauṣṭulyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñā
XXadsp70-u:1444: saṃjñāsaṃjñā saṃskārasaṃjñā vijñānasaṃjñā dauṣṭulyaṃ, cakṣusaṃjñā srotrasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃjñā jihvasaṃjñā kāyasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃjñā idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. rūpasaṃjñā yāvad dharmasaṃjñā.
XXadsp70-u:1447: kuśalasaṃjñā akuśalasaṃjñā yāvat saṃskṛtasaṃjñā asaṃskṛtasaṃjñā idam api kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
XXadsp70-u:1448: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvāṇi tāni dauṣṭulyāni vivarjya ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati. so 'nnam annārthikebhyo dadāti. pānaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1449: pānārthikebhyo, yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇy upakaraṇārthikebhyo dadāti. paraṃ ca upakaraṇadāne samādāpayati. pratiṣṭhāpayati. tataś ca yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati.
XXadsp70-u:1450: evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ, yāvat sa ātmanā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptabhir ratnaiḥ paripūrya tṛbhyo ratnebhyo dānaṃ dadāti, tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena me kuśalamūlena
XXadsp70-u:1451: saptaratnamayaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ (AdSPG II 104) bhavatu. punar aparaṃ subhūte
XXadsp70-u:1452: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāni vādyāni vādayati. buddheṣu vā buddhacaityeṣu vā. tasvyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre divyāś śabdāḥ manojñā satatasamitaṃ vādyantāṃ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ divyagandhaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhebhyo vā buddhacaityebhyo vā dadāti.
XXadsp70-u:1453: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre divyā gandhā
XXadsp70-u:1454: pravāntu. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śatarasāni
XXadsp70-u:1455: bhojanāni tathāgatebhyo vā tathāgataśrāvakebhyo vā dadāti. tasyaivaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1456: bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1457: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya śrāvakasaṃghasya śatarasāni bhojanāny abhinirvartaṃtāṃ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāny
XXadsp70-u:1458: anulepanāni dadāti. tathāgateṣu vā tathāgatacaityeṣu vā. tasyaivaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1459: bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra me buddhakṣetre sarvasattvāni divyāḥ sparśā abhinirvartantām. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati.
XXadsp70-u:1460: manorathasaṃkalpair eva iṣṭān pañcakāmaguṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca upanāmayeyaṃ. tasyaivaṃ jānataḥ evaṃ bhavaty,
XXadsp70-u:1461: anena kuśalamūlena tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sarvaśrāvakasaṃghasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca manorathasaṃkalpenaiva iṣṭāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāḥ prādurbhavanti. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ buddhebhyo vā śrāvakebhyo vā pañcakāmaguṇān dānan dadāti. punar aparaṃ subhūte
XXadsp70-u:1462: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati. yanv aham ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyeya. sarvasattvāṃś ca prathame
XXadsp70-u:1463: dhyāne niveśayeyaṃ. evaṃ yāva caturthe dhyāne niveśayeyaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1464: pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ. maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣayāṃ yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu. tasya me 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhim
XXadsp70-u:1465: abhisaṃbuddhasya sarvasattvāś caturbhir dhyānair avirahitā bhaveyuś caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir smṛtyupasthānair yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyair dharmair avirahitā bhaveyu. evaṃ khalu subhūte [f. 298a]
XXadsp70-u:1466: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati, (AdSPG II 105) sa tāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na abhisaṃbudhyate. yāvan neme sarva
XXadsp70-u:1467: abhiprāyā paripūryante. sa ātmanā ca sarvakuśalamūlasamanvāgato bhavati.
XXadsp70-u:1468: tāṃś ca sarvasattvān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatān karoti. tasya abhirūpaḥ kāyo
XXadsp70-u:1469: bhavaty apy ātmanaḥ api teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXadsp70-u:1470: paripācitā. teṣāṃ so 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika. kāyo 'bhinirvartate.
XXadsp70-u:1471: yaduta puṇyaparigṛhītatvāt. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati. tathā ca pariśodhayati. yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati. dṛṣṭigatānām api prajñaptir na
XXadsp70-u:1472: bhaviṣyati. rāgadoṣamohānāṃ prajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. stripuruṣaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. dvayor yānayo prajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. anityaduḥkha anātmaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. parigrāhaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati.
XXadsp70-u:1473: ahaṃkāramamakāraprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. anuśayaparyutthānaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. viparyāsaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. phalavyavasthānaprajñaptir na bhaviṣyati. anyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasya samādher ghoṣo
XXadsp70-u:1474: niścariṣyati. tyāgecchatāyā. sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ghoṣo niścariṣyati.
XXadsp70-u:1475: yadi vādhyātmikānāṃ yadi vā bāhyānāṃ vāritānām evaṃ ghoṣo niścariṣyati.
XXadsp70-u:1476: śūnyatā iti vā ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā. yathaivaiṣān dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathaiva śabdo niścariṣyati. sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyā
XXadsp70-u:1477: iti, yathā teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathaiva śabdo niścariṣyati. utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ, yac chūnyaṃ tatra nimittaṃ nāsti. yatra nimittaṃ nāsti tad
XXadsp70-u:1478: apraṇihitaṃ. eṣā sā evaṃrūpā dharmadeśanā niścariṣyati. rātrau vā divā vā sthitānāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā. śayānāṃ vā caṃkramyamāṇānāṃ vā. īdṛśī dharmadeśanā niścariṣyati. tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
XXadsp70-u:1479: abhisaṃbuddhasya. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasya arhata samyaksaṃbuddhasya
XXadsp70-u:1480: ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te sarve varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
XXadsp70-u:1481: ye khalu punas tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti. sarve te niyatā
XXadsp70-u:1482: bhaviṣyanty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ (AdSPG II 106) samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya dharman deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyaty
XXadsp70-u:1483: ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ na dharma iti. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā khalu punar
XXadsp70-u:1484: sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva sa dharmaḥ, tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā anavaruptakuśalamūlā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā. akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā ātmadṛṣṭim ālīyante. yāvat sarvadṛṣṭigatāny ālīyante. anteṣu tiṣṭhanti. ucchede śāśvate vā, te mithyāgrāheṇa gṛhītā asamyaksaṃbuddheṣu samyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddheṣu vā asamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinaḥ. te adharmaṃ dharma iti
XXadsp70-u:1485: vadanti. dharmaṃ vā adharma iti vadanti. te dharmaṃ pratikṣipanti,
XXadsp70-u:1486: pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātān narakeṣu
XXadsp70-u:1487: upapadyante, tatra buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān saṃsāraparyāpannān tataḥ pāpakād dṛṣṭigatān
XXadsp70-u:1488: vivecayanti. vivecya aniyate [f. 298b] rāśau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. tatra pratiṣṭhāpitā punar apāyeṣu upapadyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati, yasya pariśodhanāt sattvānāṃ na kvacin niketo bhavati. laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu lokottareṣu vā dharmeṣu
XXadsp70-u:1489: sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣv asaṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣu, yāvat sarvasattvā niyatā bhavanty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. ((77))
XXadsp70-u:1491: (VIII 5,16) atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ atha aniyataḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1492: bhagavān āha: niyataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na aniyataḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1494: āha: katamatra rāśau niyata. śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā buddharāśau vā?
XXadsp70-u:1495: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā, buddhabhūmau subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
XXadsp70-u:1497: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyata utāho 'vaivartikaḥ utāho caramabhavikaḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1498: bhagavān āha: prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyata avaivartiko niyataś caramabhaviko
XXadsp70-u:1499: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan niyato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo apāyeṣu upapadyate?
XXadsp70-u:1500: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ subhūte. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā apāyeṣu upapadyate?
XXadsp70-u:1502: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
XXadsp70-u:1503: prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dadañc chīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntyā saṃpādayan vīryaṃ vārabhamāṇaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadyamānaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1505: akuśaladharmaprahāṇāya tiṣṭhati. so 'pāyeṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1506: vidyate. dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
XXadsp70-u:1507: yatra vā apracāraḥ kuśaladharmāṇām eḍamūkeṣu vā janapadeṣu upapadyeta iti.
XXadsp70-u:1508: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. dasyuṣu mleccheṣu pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣu upapadyeta iti. yatra agatiś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
XXadsp70-u:1509: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tatra ca upapadyeta yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabda iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ (AdSPG II 108) vidyate. akriyādṛṣṭiṃ vā pated iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1510: vidyate. api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ adhyāśayena,
XXadsp70-u:1511: dasākuśalāḥ karmapathān adhyāpadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
XXadsp70-u:1512: āha: yadi bhagavam bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgataḥ
XXadsp70-u:1513: yaduta apratirūpeṣu sthāneṣu nopapadyate. tad yāni imāni tathāgatena ātmanas tiryaggatijātakāni nirdiṣṭāni. imāni punas tatra kuśalamūlaṃ kva gatāni?
XXadsp70-u:1514: bhagavān āha: na punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'śubhenakarmaṇā
XXadsp70-u:1515: tiryaggatāv upadadyate. api tu yena yena ātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaṃs taṃ tam eva ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya sattvānām arthāya parigṛhṇāti.
XXadsp70-u:1516: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte asty arhatāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā tad upāyakauśalaṃ yena upāyakauśalena [f. 299a] samanvāgatas tiryagyonigatau6(upapannaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1519: bhagavān āha: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalam asti yena tatra upapannaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1520: syād. ye 'sya vadhāya parākramanti tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati
XXadsp70-u:1521: vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. teṣāṃ sattvānām eva arthāya ātmānaṃ ca
XXadsp70-u:1522: parityajati. na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhaṃ karoti. tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ. yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayann anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye tiryagyonāv vyupapadyate. na ca tiryagyonigatair dosair lipyate.
XXadsp70-u:1523: āha: katameṣu bhagavaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān evaṃrūpān ātmabhāvān
XXadsp70-u:1524: bhagavān āha: katamaṃ subhūte kuśalo dharmo yo bodhisattvena (AdSPG II
XXadsp70-u:1525: 109) mahāsattvena na paripūrayitavyāḥ? sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhi. tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścit kuśalo dharmo yo na
XXadsp70-u:1526: paripūrayitavyaḥ. na hi sa kaścit kuśalo dharmo yena aparipūritena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ. yatra śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām
XXadsp70-u:1528: āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tāvac
XXadsp70-u:1529: chukladharmasamanvāgataḥ āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa apāyeṣu upapadyate.
XXadsp70-u:1531: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punar. subhūte tathāgata āryo 'nāsravaḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1532: āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. āryo 'nāsravas tathāgataḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1533: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tairyagyonikaṃ prāṇinam abhinirmimītaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1536: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tairyagyoniko bhavet?
XXadsp70-u:1538: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tairyagyonikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavet?
XXadsp70-u:1540: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti. yena ātmabhāvena sattvān paripācayati. yathārhaṃ yathāyogyaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1541: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann arhan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti. yo 'bhinirmito
XXadsp70-u:1542: 'rhankarma kuryād, yena karmaṇā parasya prītiṃ jānayet?
XXadsp70-u:1543: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. evam eva bodhisattvo
XXadsp70-u:1544: mahāsattvaḥ āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ saṃcintya (AdSPG II
XXadsp70-u:1545: 110) tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti. yena ātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1546: buddhakāryaṃ karoti. na ca tena tathārūpeṇa ātmabhāvena duḥkhito bhavati.
XXadsp70-u:1547: na duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhavati. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāṃ māyākāro
XXadsp70-u:1548: māyān darśayati. hastivigrahāṃ vā aśvavigrahāṃ vā balīvardavigrahāṃ vā
XXadsp70-u:1549: anyāṃ vā vividhāṃ māyāṃ darśayati. api nu te hastivigrahā bhavanty aśvavigrahā vā valīvardavigrahā vā anyā vā vividhā prāṇijātaya?
XXadsp70-u:1551: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇa anāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati. saṃcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
XXadsp70-u:1552: yathārūpeṇa ātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti. na ca tathārūpāṃ vedanāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1554: athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: mahopāyakauśalaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo hi nāma bhagavann āryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato yena yena ātmabhāvena śaknoti sattvānām arthaḥ kartuṃ taṃ tam eva ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
XXadsp70-u:1555: (VIII 5,17) katameṣu bhagavaṃc chukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo
XXadsp70-u:1556: mahāsattvo [f. 299b] imāny evaṃrūpāny upāyakauśalāni karoti na ca tair
XXadsp70-u:1558: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imāny evaṃrūpāny upāyakauśalāni karoti. yair upāyakauśalai pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt tiryak samantād daśasu dikṣv
XXadsp70-u:1559: aikaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1560: karoti. na ca tena tatra kiṃcit saṃspṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa
XXadsp70-u:1561: bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvathaiva dharmaṃ nopalabhate. yo vā saṃspṛśyeta
XXadsp70-u:1562: yena vā saṃpṛśyeta yatra vā saṃspṛśyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarva
XXadsp70-u:1563: ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ. na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ saṃspṛśati. na api śūnyatāṃ kaścid dharma saṃspṛśati. na api śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyate. iyaṃ (AdSPG II 111)
XXadsp70-u:1564: sā anupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1566: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthitvā na anyeṣu dharmeṣu?
XXadsp70-u:1567: bhagavān āha: asti punaḥ subhūte kaścid dharmo yo na prajñāpāramitāyām antargataḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1568: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ. prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena śūnyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā antargatā? na ca bhagavaṃc chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmo 'ntargato vā na vā antargataḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1569: bhagavān āha: na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1571: bhagavān āha: yadi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyā, na nu sarvadharmā śūnyatāyām
XXadsp70-u:1573: bhagavān āha: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ, yat prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalaṃ kurute.
XXadsp70-u:1574: (VIII 5,18) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirmāti? yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati. tatra lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti tāṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1575: paryupāste dharmaṃ ca śṛṇoti. tatra ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati?
XXadsp70-u:1576: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātavas tāṃ sarvāṃ śūnyā iti paśyati. ye 'pi
XXadsp70-u:1577: tatra buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā bhagavantas svabhāvaśunyā4na
XXadsp70-u:1578: anyatra nāmasaṃketena prajñaptim upādāya nirdiśyante. sarvāḥ prajñapti svabhāvena śūnyāḥ, yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyāḥ abhaviṣyaṃs,
XXadsp70-u:1579: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs, te 'pi
XXadsp70-u:1580: prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā (AdSPG II 112) abhaviṣyaṃs, tat prādesikī śūnyatābhaviṣyat. yasmān na prādeśikī śūnyatā tasmāt sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva
XXadsp70-u:1582: yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati. divyaśrotram ṛddhiṃ paracittajñānaṃ. pūrve nivāsaṃ cyutopapattiṃ, na ca vinā abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1584: abhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā; tebhir eva abhijñābhir bodhir
XXadsp70-u:1585: mārgayitavyā; sa mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā ātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati. paraṃ ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojayati. na ca teṣu kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu abhiniveṣṭhate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ
XXadsp70-u:1586: svabhāvena śūnyā. na hi śūnyatāyā kvacid abhiniviśate. yad abhiniviśya āsvādayet. nirāsvādā hi śūnyatā. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1587: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati. yena divyena cakṣuṣā
XXadsp70-u:1588: sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti paśyati, tat punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān dharmatām āgamya karma abhiniropayati. yayā karmābhiniruptyā sattvānān
XXadsp70-u:1589: dharman deśayati. na punaḥ sattvaṃ na sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate. ity anupalaṃbhayogena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ abhijñāpāramitām abhinirmāti.
XXadsp70-u:1590: yābhir abhijñābhir ye 'bhijñākaraṇīyān dharmān tān karoti. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād diśi vidikṣv
XXadsp70-u:1591: ūrdhvam [**] tiryag lokadhātūṃ paśyati. sa tatra ṛdhyā gatvā sattvānām arthaṃ (AdSPG II 113) karoti. yadi vā dānena yadi vā śīlena yadi vā kṣāntyā yadi vā vīryeṇa yadi vā samādhmā yadi vā prajñāyā yadi vā
XXadsp70-u:1592: saptatṛṃśatā bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ yadi vā dhyānāpramāṇārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattibhir yadi vā śrāvakadharmair yadi vā. pratyekabuddhadharmair yadi vā bodhisattvadharmair yadi vā
XXadsp70-u:1593: buddhadharmais teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyakaro bhavati. tatra ye sattvā
XXadsp70-u:1594: matsariṇas teṣām evan dharman deśayati. dadadhvad dānan, duḥkhaṃ hi dāridryaṃ, na hi dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'py arthaḥ kartuṃ. prāg eva parasya, tad yūyam ātmanā ca duḥkitā bhaviṣyathaḥ paraṃ ca duḥkhayiṣyatha,
XXadsp70-u:1595: mā dāridryeṇa abhibhūtā anyonya māṃsāni khādanto na parimokṣyadhve tṛbhyo
XXadsp70-u:1596: 'pāyebhyaḥ, ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evan dharman deśayati. duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ, na hi duḥśīlena śakyam ātmano 'py arthaḥ kartuṃ,
XXadsp70-u:1597: prāg eva parasya. dauḥśīlyasya yo vipākaḥ sa narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā, tad yūyaṃ tṛṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā. ātmānam eva na śakyā arthaṃ kartuṃ prāg eva param, tad yuṣmābhir ekadauḥśīlyasya cittasya apy avakāśo
XXadsp70-u:1598: na dātavyo, mā paścāt tāpino 'bhūt. ye sattvās parasparaṃ vyāpannacittās teṣām evan dharman deśayati. mā yūyam anyonyaṃ vyāpadyadhvaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1599: kṣubhitacittānāṃ satāṃ na kaścit kuśalo dharmaḥ prādurbhavati, tad yuṣmākam anyonyakṣubhitacittānāṃ satāṃ sthānam etad vidyate. yan narakopapattir bhaved vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā, haṃta yuṣmābhir ekacittam api na kṣobhayitavyaṃ, prāg eva anyeṣāṃ akuśalānāṃ cittānām avakāśo na dātavyaḥ iti. ye kusīdās tāṃ vīrye niyojayati, evaṃ yāvad ye
XXadsp70-u:1600: vikṣiptacittās tān samādhau niyojayati. ye duṣprajñās tān prajñāyāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1601: niyojayati. ye rāgacaritās tān aśubhāyāṃ niyojayati. ye dveṣacaritās tāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1602: maitryāṃ niyojayati. [f. 301b] ye mohacaritās tāṃ pratītyasamutpāde
XXadsp70-u:1603: niyojayati. ye kumārge prasthitās tān mārge niyojayati. yadi vā śrāvakamārge yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge niyojayati. teṣām evan dharman
XXadsp70-u:1604: deśayati, yatra yūyam abhiniviṣṭās te dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā, na hi svabhāvena śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śakyam abhiniveṣṭuṃ. anabhiniviṣṭā ca (AdSPG
XXadsp70-u:1605: II 114) śūnyatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti. nāsti subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena śakyam abhijñāsv asthitvā sattvānāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1606: dharman deśayituṃ, utpathaprasthitā vā sattvā mārgam avatārayituṃ nedaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1607: sthānaṃ vidyate. yathā subhūte pakṣī śakunir apakṣako na śaknoty ākāśena krāmitum evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva anāgamya abhijñā na
XXadsp70-u:1608: śaknoti. dharman deśayituṃ. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ. sa ābhir abhijñābhir abhinirhartābhir yam ākāṅkṣiśyati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ taṃ sukhina kariṣyati. divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānādīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
XXadsp70-u:1609: drakṣyati. tāṃś ca tatra sattvān upapannān drakṣyati. dṛṣṭvā ca tān
XXadsp70-u:1610: sattvān ṛdhyā gatvā cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñāsyati, prajñāya tathaiva dharman deśayiṣyati. yadi vā dānakathāṃ yadi vā yāvan nairyānikīṃ kathāṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1611: sa divyena śrotradhātunā ubhau śabdau śroṣyati. yaduta divyāṃś ca
XXadsp70-u:1612: mānuṣyakāṃś ca. tatra ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto
XXadsp70-u:1613: dharmaṃ deśayanti. sa tena divyena śrotradhātunā tān dharmān śroṣyati.
XXadsp70-u:1614: śrutvā ca tathātvāya udgrahīṣyati. tathātvāya udgṛhya ananyathātvāya
XXadsp70-u:1615: dharman deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. tasya cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ suviśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati. sa tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena
XXadsp70-u:1616: sattvānāṃ cittaṃ prajñāsyati. teṣān tathātvāya dharman deśayiṣyati.
XXadsp70-u:1617: dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmariṣyati anya ātmano 'pi parasya api. sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena evaṃ jñāsyaty evaṃnāmakās te 'bhūvan. paurvakās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā saśrāvakās, tatra ye sattvā
XXadsp70-u:1619: deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. sa ṛddhyā anekān vividhāṃ lokadhātūṃ gatvā buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ paryupāsiṣyate paryupāsya abhijñānena sattvānāṃ dharman deśayiṣyati. dānakathāṃ yāvan nairyāṇikakathāṃ. sa āsravakṣayajñānena suviditena sattvānān dharman deśayiṣyati. yadi vā dānakathāṃ yadi vā nairyāṇikakathāṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca (AdSPG II 115) ratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyā. sa ebhir abhijñābhiḥ suparicitābhi yaṃ yam eva ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhītum ākāṅkṣiṣyati. taṃ tam eva ātmabhāvaṃ parigrahīsyati. sa na ca
XXadsp70-u:1620: tena sukhena vā duḥkhena vā sumanā vā durmanā vā bhaviṣyati. naiva asya anunayapratighau bhaviṣyatha. tadyathāpi nāma tathāgatanirmitaḥ [f. 302a]
XXadsp70-u:1621: puruṣaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoti. na ca tena sukhena vā duḥkhena vā kliśyate.
XXadsp70-u:1622: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñāvikrīḍitena bhavitavyaṃ. yathā vikrīḍamāno buddhakṣetraṃ ca
XXadsp70-u:1623: pariśodhayiṣyati. sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati. na punaḥ subhūte
XXadsp70-u:1624: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apariśodhite buddhakṣetre aparipāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1625: nāsti subhūte mārgāṅgavikalasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarā
XXadsp70-u:1627: (VIII 5,19) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgāṅgāni. yāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
XXadsp70-u:1628: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: sarvakuśaladharmāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgāṅgāni.
XXadsp70-u:1629: āha: te punar bhagavan katame kuśaladharmā mārgāṅgāni. yair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate?
XXadsp70-u:1630: bhagavān āha: prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra yā akalpanā yad dadan na kalapyati. idaṃ dānan asmai dadāmy ahan dadāmi ity etat trayaṃ na kalpayati. svabhāvaśunyatām upādāya, yayā pāramitayā ātmanā ca tarati paraṃ ca tārayati saṃsārārṇavāt. ime te kuśaladharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgo yena mārgena atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca (AdSPG II 116) saṃsārārṇavāt. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā samādhipāramitā prajñāpāramitā catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ catvāri
XXadsp70-u:1631: smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni. catvārarddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni.
XXadsp70-u:1632: caturdaśaśūnyatā aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni. pratisaṃvido yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, yāvantaḥ kecid bodhimārgā ime te kuśalā dharmā ye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyā yāṃ paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. yām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati. ((78))
XXadsp70-u:1634: (VIII 5,20) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann ime dharmā bodhisattvadharmās tad buddhadharmās punar katame?
XXadsp70-u:1635: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha. yadi ime dharmā
XXadsp70-u:1636: bodhisattvadharmās tad buddhadharmāḥ punaḥ katama iti. ima eva subhūte
XXadsp70-u:1637: buddhadharmā yademān dharmān sarvākārair abhisaṃbudhyate. tasya sarvākārajñatāprāptasya sarvavāsanānusandhiḥ prahīyate, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhisaṃbudhyate, tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmān ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā abhisaṃbuddhaḥ, ayaṃ viśeṣo bodhisattvasya
XXadsp70-u:1638: ca tathāgatasya ca arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
XXadsp70-u:1639: anya eva pratipannako anya eva phalastaḥ, na ca na tāv ubhāv āryapudgalau,
XXadsp70-u:1640: evam eva subhūte (AdSPG II 117) bodhisattvo mahāsattva ānantaryamārge [f.
XXadsp70-u:1641: 302b] pratipannakastaḥ, tathāgatas punar arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anandhakāratā prāpta, iyaṃ subhūte viśeso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatasya ca arhata samyaksaṃbuddhasya.
XXadsp70-u:1642: athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi punar bhagavann ime dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ, svalaksaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kuto viśeṣo nānākaraṇaṃ vā upalabhyate? ayaṃ nairayiko 'yaṃ tairyagyoniko 'yaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1643: yamalaukikaḥ ayaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣya ayaṃ gotrabhūr ayam aṣṭamaka ayaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1644: srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho
XXadsp70-u:1645: 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. yathaiva bhagavann ime pudgalā nopalabhyante. tathaiva bhagavaṃ. karma nopalabhyate. yathaiva karma nopalabhyate tathaiva karmavipāko nopalabhyate.
XXadsp70-u:1646: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi. svalaksaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma na vipāka
XXadsp70-u:1647: upalabhyate. ye punaḥ subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti te karma
XXadsp70-u:1648: abhisaṃskurvanti. duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vā anāsravaṃ vā. te duścaritena karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti. sucaritena devamanuṣyeṣu upapadyante. acchidreṇa karmaṇā rūpadhātau vā arūpyadhātau vā copapayante.
XXadsp70-u:1649: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracāri imān bodhisattvadharmān
XXadsp70-u:1650: utpādayati. yān utpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṇi karoti. yo 'rtha. kṛto na punar vipraṇaśyati. yasya vipraṇāśāt pañcagatike saṃsāre prapatet.
XXadsp70-u:1651: aha: kiṃ punar bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
XXadsp70-u:1654: āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatena kṛṣṇā vā śuklā vā akṛṣṇāśuklā vā dharmāḥ
XXadsp70-u:1658: āha: yadi nopalabdhā. kuto narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamalokā vā prajñaptāḥ kuto devamanuṣyāḥ prajñaptāḥ kutaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ kuto bodhisattvaḥ kutas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1660: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyāṃ. sarvadharmāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1663: bhagavān āha: yadi punaḥ subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā iti. tan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
XXadsp70-u:1665: saṃsāragatibhyaḥ. yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmās te aprajānanto na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvānām arthāya anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
XXadsp70-u:1666: saṃpratiṣṭhate. neme dharmās tathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā
XXadsp70-u:1667: abhiniviṣṭā, tad ime sattvāḥ asataḥ asaṃvidyamānān dharmān svataḥ kalpayitvā upalabhya: asattve sattvasaṃjñinaḥ arūpe rūpasaṃjñina.
XXadsp70-u:1668: avedanāyāṃ vedanāsaṃjñinaḥ asaṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñinaḥ asaṃskāreṣu saṃskārasaṃjñinaḥ avijñāne vijñānasaṃjñinaḥ [f. 303a] yāvad asaṃskṛtadharmān asato 'saṃvidyamānā kalpayitvā, viparyāsair
XXadsp70-u:1669: viparyastacittā. kāyena vācā manasā karma abhisaṃskurvanti. te pañcagatikāt saṃsārān na parimucyante. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1670: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati. yāṃ cārikāṃ carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
XXadsp70-u:1671: (VIII 5,21). abhisaṃbudhya duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhasamudayaṃ ca duḥkhanirodhaṃ ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ ca pratipādam ācaṣṭe (AdSPG II 119) deśayati.
XXadsp70-u:1673: saṃprakāśayati. tatra caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarve 'ntargatā kuśalā dharmā ye
XXadsp70-u:1674: kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmāyair bodhipakṣyair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati. katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ? buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya, eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante
XXadsp70-u:1676: athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantaṃ etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavan
XXadsp70-u:1677: duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavaty atha duḥkhena, samudayajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavaty atha samudayena, duḥkhanirodhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavaty atha duḥkhanirodhena: mārgajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavaty atha
XXadsp70-u:1679: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na subhūte duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati na duḥkhena, na samudayajñānena parmirvāṇaṃ bhavati. na samudayena. na duḥkhanirodhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1680: bhavati. na duḥkhanirodhena. na mārgajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati na mārgeṇa. yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā, na puna duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati. na duḥkhena na
XXadsp70-u:1681: samudayajñānena na samudayena na duḥkhanirodhajñānena na duḥkhanirodhena na mārgajñānena na mārgeṇa parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati.
XXadsp70-u:1682: āha: katamā eṣaṃ bhagavaṃs caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā?
XXadsp70-u:1683: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhajñānaṃ na samudayo na
XXadsp70-u:1684: samudayajñānaṃ na nirodho na nirodhajñānaṃ na mārgo na mārgajñānaṃ. yaiṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ tathatā avitathatā dharmatā. dharmadhātur dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthitā. yad utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā
XXadsp70-u:1685: tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dhātur yaduta dharmadhātuḥ asaṃpramoṣāya aparihāṇāya saṃvartate. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhāya carati. na ca satyāny anubodhavyāni.
XXadsp70-u:1687: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhavavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1688: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhāya carati.
XXadsp70-u:1689: yathā caraṃ satyāny anubudhyate. abhisaṃbudhya tathātvaṃ pratividhyati.
XXadsp70-u:1690: yathā pratividhyan naiva śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmau
XXadsp70-u:1692: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tān dharmāṃs tathā paśyati. yathā paśyaṃ kiṃcid dharmam upalabheta. anupalabhamānaḥ sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti paśyati. satyaparyāpannāṃś ca asatyaparyāpannāñ
XXadsp70-u:1693: ca tān sarvān śūnyā iti paśyati. sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvagotrabhūbhūmau sthito bhavati. sa bodhisattvagotrabhūbhūmau sthitvā na mūrdhna nipātaṃ patati. yena [f.
XXadsp70-u:1694: 303b] mūrdhna nipātena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati. sa iha bodhisattvagotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīḥ. sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti. catvāry āryasatyāni prativibudhyati. sa ca duḥkhañ ca parijānāti. na ca duḥkhārambaṇāṃ cittam utpādayati. samudayaṃ ca prajāhati. na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati. nirodhaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti. na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati. mārgaṃ ca bhāvayati
XXadsp70-u:1695: na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati. anyatra bodhinimnena cittena
XXadsp70-u:1700: bhagavān āha: svalaksaṇaśūnyatā. so 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti vipaśyati. na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1701: paśyati. yatra bhāve sthitvā bodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta.
XXadsp70-u:1702: āha: evaṃ sati bhagavann abhāvaś ca bodhiḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1703: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad. yathā vadasi. abhāvaś (AdSPG II
XXadsp70-u:1704: 121) ca bodhiḥ, sā na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na arhadbhir nāpi
XXadsp70-u:1705: tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair, ya iha bodhāya caranti. anyatra sattvā na
XXadsp70-u:1706: jānanti na paśyanti yathātvaṃ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva
XXadsp70-u:1707: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati. ((79))
XXadsp70-u:1709: (VIII 5,22) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvā sarvadharmās, te na buddhai kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na arhadbhir na anāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir na srotaāpannair na
XXadsp70-u:1710: pratipannakair nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā ya iha bodhāya
XXadsp70-u:1711: caranti. tat kuta esān dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate, ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime
XXadsp70-u:1712: manuṣyāḥ, anena vā karmaṇā narakās tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ anena karmaṇā devāḥ anena karmaṇā manuṣyāḥ anena karmaṇā brahmakāyikā devāḥ yāvan
XXadsp70-u:1713: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ. anena karmaṇā srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhāḥ anena karmaṇā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena
XXadsp70-u:1714: karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. abhāvasya hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā kriyā narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamānuṣyaṃ vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta.
XXadsp70-u:1715: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā anuprāpnuyāt sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā, bodhisattvo vā mahāsattvo bodhimārge caret tathāgato vā 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ vā anuprāpnuyād yām anuprāpya sattvāṃ saṃsārāṃ mocayed.
XXadsp70-u:1716: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi, abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ. bālo hi subhūte (AdSPG II 122)
XXadsp70-u:1717: aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ āryadharmeṣv akovidaḥ abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na
XXadsp70-u:1718: prajānāti. sa viparyāsasamutthitena cittena vividhaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti.
XXadsp70-u:1719: tasya tādṛśa eva ātmabhāvo abhinirvartate. yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu [f.
XXadsp70-u:1720: 304a] deveṣu. yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ. yaḥ punar abhāvaḥ abhāva eva saḥ. yat punar subhūtir evam āha. abhāvasya hi na kācit kriyā yayā kriyayā yāvat srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā anuprāpnuyāt.
XXadsp70-u:1721: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā,
XXadsp70-u:1722: bodhisattvo vā mahāsattvo mārgākārajñatāyāñc caret tathāgato vārhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti. yām anuprāpya sattvān
XXadsp70-u:1723: saṃsārān mocayet. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte na abhāvo mārgaḥ abhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'nāgāmiphalam abhāvo
XXadsp70-u:1725: āha: abhāvo bhagavan mārgaḥ abhāva srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ
XXadsp70-u:1726: sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhatvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat
XXadsp70-u:1727: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte abhāvo dharmaḥ abhāvan dharmam anuprāpnoti?
XXadsp70-u:1729: bhagavān āha: iti hi subhūte. yaś ca abhāvo yaś ca mārga ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktauv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yaduta alaksaṇau, tatra subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvāṃś caturbhir viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāṃ pañcaskandheṣu anitye nityasaṃjñīno duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñīnaḥ anātmāny ātmasaṃjñinaḥ. aśubhe śubhasaṃjñīno bhāvābhiviniṣṭās tato bhāvād vivecayati.
XXadsp70-u:1730: (VIII 5,23) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kaccid bhagavan vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhāvaṃs tathatā avitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā
XXadsp70-u:1731: vastv ity abhiniviśante. bhūtaṃ bhāvas tathatā avitathatā. (AdSPG II 123)
XXadsp70-u:1732: yadi nāsti kathaṃ karma abhisaṃskurvanti. yena karmaṇā pañcagatikāt
XXadsp70-u:1734: bhagavān āha: nāsti subhūte antaśo balāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api vastu
XXadsp70-u:1735: yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā karmābhisaṃskurvanti anyatra viparyāsena.
XXadsp70-u:1736: tena hi subhūte upamān te kariṣyāmi yāvad eva asyaivārthasya bhūyasyāmātrayā paripūraye yathāpaṇḍitājānīyuḥ. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit svapnadarśino vastv asti. yatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricārayet?
XXadsp70-u:1737: āha: svapna eva tāvan nāsti. kutaḥ punaḥ svapnadarśī, tatra sthitvā pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ
XXadsp70-u:1738: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit punar dharmo 'sti saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā yo na svapnopamaḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1739: āha: nāsti bhagavaṃ. kaścid dharma saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā yo na
XXadsp70-u:1740: bhagavān āha: kaccit punaḥ svapne pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro 'sti?
XXadsp70-u:1742: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte svapne mārgabhāvanā asti, yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
XXadsp70-u:1743: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann, avastukaḥ sa bhagavan dharmaḥ aprajñaptikaḥ aprajñapanīyaḥ sarvavyāhārapadavyañjanaiḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1744: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadā ādarśamaṇḍale pratibimban dṛśyate kaccit tasya vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryāt yat
XXadsp70-u:1745: karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyān vā?
XXadsp70-u:1746: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann, avastukaṃ bhagavan pratibimbaṃ anyatra bālānām ullāpakaṃ, tat kuto 'sya [f. 304b] karma bhavisyati. (AdSPG II 124) yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā.
XXadsp70-u:1748: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasya mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
XXadsp70-u:1749: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukaṃś ca bhagavan pratibimbaṃ tat kuto 'sya
XXadsp70-u:1750: mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na
XXadsp70-u:1752: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā sā pratiśrutkā vanagahanaparvatakandaraprāgbhārato niścarati. kaccit tasyā pratiśrutkāyā
XXadsp70-u:1753: vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryāt, yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya. narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamakokaṃ vā?
XXadsp70-u:1754: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavam avastukā bhagavaṃ. sā pratiśrutkā kutas tasyāḥ karma bhaviṣyati. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta.
XXadsp70-u:1755: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasyāḥ pratiśrutkāyā mārgabhāvanā asti: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na
XXadsp70-u:1757: āha: atyantatayā bhagavan saiva pratiṣrutkā nāsti. kutaḥ punas tasyā
XXadsp70-u:1758: mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na
XXadsp70-u:1760: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yeyaṃ marīcikāyām anudake
XXadsp70-u:1761: udakasaṃjñā. anadyāṃ nadīsaṃjñā. anagare nagarasaṃjñā. anudyāne udyānasaṃjñā tat kiṃ tasyāṃ marīcikāyā saṃjñāyāṃ karma asti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā
XXadsp70-u:1762: devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu
XXadsp70-u:1764: āha: atyantatayā bhagavaṃ marīcikāyām udakan nāsti. na nadī, na nagara udyānam anyatra saṃjñāviparyāsaś cakṣuṣo moha. kutas tasyā karma
XXadsp70-u:1765: bhaviṣyati. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta.
XXadsp70-u:1766: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasyā viparyastasaṃjñāyā mārgabhāvanā asti. yān mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na
XXadsp70-u:1768: āha: na bhagavan viparyastāyāḥ saṃjñāyā mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
XXadsp70-u:1770: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāṃ māyākāro vividhān māyām abhinirminoti. yadi vā hastikāyaṃ yadi vā aśvakāyaṃ yadi vā balīvardakāyaṃ. yadi vā pattikāyaṃ. yadi vā rathakāyaṃ yadi vā strikāyaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1771: yadi vā puruṣakāyaṃ, api nu tasyā māyāyā vastv asti. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā
XXadsp70-u:1773: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ, na hi tasyā māyāyā vastv asty antaśo balāgrakoṭinikṣepamātram api. yatra sthitvā karmābhisaṃskuryāt. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā
XXadsp70-u:1774: devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta. yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu deveṣu
XXadsp70-u:1776: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaścit tasyā māyāyā mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
XXadsp70-u:1777: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukasya [f. 305a] dharmasya mārgabhāvanā kuto
XXadsp70-u:1779: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ punas tathāgato nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti kaccit tasya nirmitasya vastv asti. yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā
XXadsp70-u:1781: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukaḥ sa bhagavaṃ nirmitaḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1782: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. kaccit tasya nirmitasya
XXadsp70-u:1783: mārgabhāvanā asti. yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na
XXadsp70-u:1786: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaścid atra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā?
XXadsp70-u:1788: bhagavān āha: yathaiva subhūte kaścin na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate tathaiva nāsti saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. tat kasya hetor? ahaṃkāramamakārayo
XXadsp70-u:1789: sthitvā: sattvāḥ saṃkliśyante vā vyavadāyante vā, na ca bhūtadarśī
XXadsp70-u:1790: saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā. yathaiva bhūtadarśī na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate tathaiva nāsti saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. ((80))
XXadsp70-u:1793: (VIII 5,24) athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: bhūtadarśī bhagavaṃ na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. 'bhūtadarśy api na saṃkliśyate na
XXadsp70-u:1794: vyavadāyate. tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, abhāvasya ca bhagavaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1795: na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. bhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na
XXadsp70-u:1796: vyavadānam, svabhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1797: abhāvasvabhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ. tad yad etad
XXadsp70-u:1798: bhagavatā vyavadānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ, tat katham idaṃ bhagavan?
XXadsp70-u:1799: bhagavān āha: yā eṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tan mayoktaṃ vyavadānaṃ?
XXadsp70-u:1800: āha: sā punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā katamā?
XXadsp70-u:1801: bhagavān āha: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā. dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ yo 'sāv utpādād vā tathāgatānām
XXadsp70-u:1802: anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dharmasthititādhātur yaduta dharmadhātur idaṃ subhūte vyavadānaṃ, tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa
XXadsp70-u:1805: (VIII 5,25) āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamā.
XXadsp70-u:1806: pratibhāsopamāḥ marīcyupamāḥ māyopamā nirmitopamās, tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo
XXadsp70-u:1807: mahāsattvaḥ svapnopameṣu sarvadharmeṣu pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu sarvadharmeṣv avastukeṣv adravyeṣv anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayaty ahaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi.
XXadsp70-u:1810: abhijñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi. catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni.
XXadsp70-u:1811: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīn
XXadsp70-u:1812: daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā
XXadsp70-u:1814: anuvyañjanāni mahābhāsaṃ pariniṣpādayati yat trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātūn avabhāsena spharati,
XXadsp70-u:1815: pariniṣpādayati. yad eka svareṇa [f. 305b] daśadiglokadhātuṣu yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ajñāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi iti.
XXadsp70-u:1816: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte na tv ete dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ
XXadsp70-u:1819: āha: yady ete bhagavan dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ
XXadsp70-u:1820: pratibhāsopamā. marīcyupamā māyopamā nirmitopamā, tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo
XXadsp70-u:1821: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na hi bhagavan svapno bhūto na yāvan
XXadsp70-u:1822: nirmitaḥ. na hi bhagavann abhūtena śakyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1823: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvad astādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caratā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
XXadsp70-u:1824: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na hy abhūtena śakyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā. śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1826: buddhadharmeṣu caratā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ. sarva ete dharmā abhisaṃskṛtā abhisaṃcetayitā. na hi śakyam abhisaṇiṣkṛtair abhisaṃcetayitair dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām (AdSPG II 128) anuprāptuṃ. api tu khalu subhūte sarva ete dharmā mārgāharaṇatāya saṃvartante mārgotpādāya na puna phalasya adhigamāya, ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇām anutpāda aprādurbhāva alakṣaṇo 'pi saḥ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat tam eva kuśalan dharmam ārabhate. yadi vā dānapāramitāṃ yadi vā śīlapāramitāṃ yadi vā kṣāntipāramitāṃ. yadi vā vīryapāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānapāramitāṃ yadi vā prajñāpāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānāni yadi vā
XXadsp70-u:1827: apramāṇāni yadi vā ārūpyasamāpattīr yadi vā smṛtyupasthānāni yāvan mārgaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1828: yadi vā ādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ. yadi vā vimokṣā
XXadsp70-u:1829: navānupūrvasamāpattī yadi vā yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmān. tat sarvaṃ māyāgatam iti jānāti. na śakyam imān dharmān aparipūrya dānapāramitāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1830: śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān aparipūrya sattvān
XXadsp70-u:1831: paripācayituṃ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yaṃ yam eva kuśalan dharmam ārabhate sarvaṃ taṃ svapnopamaṃ jānāti. yāvan nirmitopamaṃ jānāti. sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ svapnopamāṃ jānāti. yāvan nirmitopamāṃ jānāti. te sarvasattvā svapne
XXadsp70-u:1832: caranti iti jānāti. yāvan nirmite caranti iti jānāti. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran. svapnopamān dharmān abhāvato gṛhṇāti.
XXadsp70-u:1833: yāvan gṛhītvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. yāvan nirmitopamān dharmān
XXadsp70-u:1834: abhāvato gṛhṇāti. yāvan gṛhītvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. agrāhyā ca prajñāpāramitā. agrāhyā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā iti viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy agrāhyāḥ
XXadsp70-u:1835: sarvadharmā avastukāḥ svapnopamāḥ yāvan nirmitopamā, na ca agrāhyeṇa. [f.
XXadsp70-u:1836: 306a] dharmeṇa agrāhyo dharmaḥ śakyam anuprāptuṃ, anyatra sattvā imān
XXadsp70-u:1837: dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti. (AdSPG II 129) tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva
XXadsp70-u:1838: sarvasattvānām arthāya anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate, sa ca prathamacittotpādam upādāya yad dānaṃ dadāti. tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte. yac chīlaṃ rakṣati yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yan vīryam ārabhate yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte, na punar ātmārthaṃ, na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyasya kṛte 'nuttarasyai
XXadsp70-u:1839: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate 'nyatra sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte, sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye asattve sattvasaṃjñayā sthitās anātmāny ātmasaṃjñayā sthitā evaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1841: yāvad ajānake jānakasaṃjñayā sthitā apaśyake paśyakasaṃjñayā sthitās tāṃ viparyāsān vivecayati. viparyāsād vivecya. amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭḥāpayati.
XXadsp70-u:1842: yatra pratiṣṭhāpitānāṃ neme samudācārāḥ pravartante. ātmasaṃjñā yāvat kārakakārāpakasaṃjñā vā, sa sarvāṇi imāni
XXadsp70-u:1843: nimiñjitamanyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tyaktvā amanyamānena cetasā bahulam upasaṃpadya viharati. anena subhūte upāyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca na kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate.
XXadsp70-u:1844: sarvasattvāṃś ca anabhiniveśe pratiṣṭhāpayati. lokavyavahāreṇa. na puna paramārthena.
XXadsp70-u:1845: āha: yo bhagavaṃs tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ, kiṃ punaḥ sa
XXadsp70-u:1847: bhagavān āha: lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahṛyate. ayaṃ tathāgatena dharmo
XXadsp70-u:1848: 'bhisaṃbuddha iti. na punar atra kaścil labhyate. ayan dharmo 'nena
XXadsp70-u:1849: dharmeṇa abhisaṃbuddha iti. tat kasya hetor? upalaṃbho hy eṣa yaduta anena dharmeṇa ayan dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti. na ca dvayena kācit prāptir na
XXadsp70-u:1851: āha: yadi bhagavan na dvayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca, kiṃ punar advayena
XXadsp70-u:1853: bhagavān āha: na dvayena prāptir na abhisamayo na advayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca, yathaivātra prāptir abhisamayaś ca. yatra na dvayaṃ na
XXadsp70-u:1854: advayaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ? prapañca eṣa yadaiṣa prāptir eso 'bhisamaya. na ca dharmasamatāyāṃ prapañco 'sti. niṣprapañca hi dharmatā.
XXadsp70-u:1856: āha: abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kā dharmasamatā?
XXadsp70-u:1857: bhagavān āha: eṣaivātra dharmasamatā yatra na bhāvo na abhāvo na svabhāvo
XXadsp70-u:1858: na parikīrtanā, na dharmasamatā parikīrtyate, na ca anyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate dharmasamatāyāṃ. sthāpayitvā sarvadharmavyativṛttā dharmasamatā, agatir aviṣayo dharmasamatā. kasyacid bālasya vā āryasya vā.
XXadsp70-u:1859: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ dharmasamatā. tathāgatasya apy aviṣayaḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1860: bhagavān āha: aviṣayaḥ subhūte. dharmasamatā. sarvāryāṇāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā anāgāmināṃ vā. arhatāṃ vā. pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ [f. 306b] vā tathāgatasya apy aviṣaya.
XXadsp70-u:1861: āha: na punar bhagavaṃ sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavarttī tathāgato 'rhan
XXadsp70-u:1864: samyaksaṃbuddho, yady anyā dharmasamatā syād anyas tathāgato 'rhan
XXadsp70-u:1865: samyaksaṃbuddho, yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanānāṃ dharmasamatā yā ca srotaāpannānāṃ yā ca sakṛdāgāmināṃ yā ca anāgāmināṃ yā ca arhatāṃ yā ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ yā ca bodhisattvānāṃ yā ca tathāgatānām dharmasamatā
XXadsp70-u:1866: ekasamatā sā, samatāyāṃś ca na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ, yā ca pṛthagjanānāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1867: samatā yā ca sarvāryāṇāṃ samatā ekasamatā sā, naikasamatāyāṃ dvayam asty
XXadsp70-u:1868: ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ yāvat tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti. sarva ete dharmā. samatāyāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1869: āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante.
XXadsp70-u:1870: ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan
XXadsp70-u:1871: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. evaṃ saty aviśeṣo bhaviṣyati. pṛthagjanānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ ca sakṛdāgāmināṃ ca anāgāmināṃ ca arhatāṃ ca
XXadsp70-u:1872: pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1874: bhagavān āha: evam eta subhūte evam etad. aviśeṣaḥ sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ (AdSPG II 131) pṛthagjanānāṃ yāvat tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1875: āha: yadi bhagavann aviśeṣaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ yāvat tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ, tat kuta eṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. buddharatmasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya?
XXadsp70-u:1876: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmasamatā?
XXadsp70-u:1877: āha: yathā ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi na anyad buddharatnam
XXadsp70-u:1878: anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmasamatā. yad eva bhagavaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1879: buddharatnaṃ yad eva dharmaratnaṃ yad eva saṃgharatnaṃ saiva dharmasamatā,
XXadsp70-u:1880: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā
XXadsp70-u:1881: ekalaksaṇā. yaduta alakṣaṇās, tat punar kathaṃ bhagavan eṣām alakṣaṇānāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1882: dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoty ayaṃ pṛthagjano ayaṃ srotaāpannaḥ ayaṃ sakṛdāgāmī ayam anāgāmī ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ ayaṃ bodhisattvo
XXadsp70-u:1884: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathāgatasyaiṣa viṣayaḥ tathāgatasyaiṣa puruṣakāro yad alaksaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti.
XXadsp70-u:1885: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhiṃ na
XXadsp70-u:1886: abhisaṃbhotsyata. anabhisaṃbudhya dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ nākariṣyād, api nu narakā vā prajñāsyante tiryagyonir vā yamaloka vā. devā vā manuṣyā vā.
XXadsp70-u:1887: cāturmahārājakāyikā vā yāvat paranirmitavaśavarttino vā brahmakāyikā vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir vā smṛtyupasthānāni vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattaya adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā.
XXadsp70-u:1888: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāsyante?
XXadsp70-u:1891: bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasyaiṣa puruṣakāro yo
XXadsp70-u:1892: dharmasamatāyā ca na calati dharmāṇāṃ ca vyavasthānaṃ karoti.
XXadsp70-u:1893: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ yathā caiva tathāgato dharmasamatāyāś ca na
XXadsp70-u:1894: calati. tathaiva pṛthagjanā na calanti. tathaiva srotaāpannā na calanti.
XXadsp70-u:1895: tathaiva yāvat pratyekabuddhā na calanti. tathaiva yāvad bodhisattvā na
XXadsp70-u:1897: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmā subhūte dharmasamatāyā na calanti. na vivantante. tat kasya hetoḥ? yaiva tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir, saiva bālapṛthagjanānāṃ tathatā yāvad bhūtakoṭir, saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānuṣāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ yāvad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathatā yāvad bhūtakoṭir. sarva ete dharmā dharmasamatāṃ na vyativarttante. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yā teṣāṃ tathatā yāvad bhūtakoṭi nānyā teṣāṃ dharmasamatāyā.
XXadsp70-u:1898: āha: yadi bhagavan yaiva dharmasamatā pṛthagjanānāṃ saiva srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saiva dharmasamatā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ, ya ime bhagavaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1899: vilakṣaṇās dharmās tadyathedaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ, anyā rūpasya dharmatā anyā vedanāyā anyā saṃjñāyā anyā saṃskārāṇām anyā vijñānasya anyā cakṣuṣo dharmatā anyā srotrasya anyā ghrāṇasya anyā jivhāyā anyā kāyasya anyā manasaḥ, anyā pṛthivīdhātor anyā abdhātor anyā tejodhātor anyā vāyudhātor anyā ākāśadhātor anyā vijñānadhātor anyā rāgasya dharmatā anyā dveṣasya anyā mohasya anyā dṛṣṭikṛtānām anyā
XXadsp70-u:1900: dhyānānām anyā apramāṇānām anyā ārūpyasamāpattīnām anyā smṛtyupasthānānām anyā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya anyā śūnyatāyā anyā ānimittasya anyā apraṇihitasya anyā ādhyātmaśūnyatāyā anyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anyā vimokṣāṇām anyā anupūrvasamāpattīnām anyā balānām anyā vaiśāradyānām anyā pratisaṃvidām anyā mahāmaitryām anyā mahākaruṇāyā anyā āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ (AdSPG II 133) dharmatā anyā saṃskṛtadhātor anyā asaṃskṛtadhātor dharmatā, kathaṃ bhagavann evaṃ vilaksaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā ekalakṣaṇā bhavati? kathaṃ punar dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
XXadsp70-u:1901: kutra vyavasthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ karoti? na ca akṛtvā dharmanānātvaṃ śakyaṃ bodhisattvena
XXadsp70-u:1902: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carituṃ. kathaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati nyāmaṃ ca avakrāmati. yayā nyāmāvakrantyā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikrāmati. atikramya abhijñā paripūrayati. yābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍamāno dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayec chīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ samādhipāramitāṃ paripūrayed vikrīḍan buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati buddhān bhagavataḥ
XXadsp70-u:1903: paryupāsinaḥ, teṣu ca kuśalamūlam avaropayati. yena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān paripācayati. buddhakṣetraṃ ca parigṛhṇāti.
XXadsp70-u:1904: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yat punaḥ subhūtir
XXadsp70-u:1905: evam āha. yadi yaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā saiva pṛthagjanānāṃ
XXadsp70-u:1906: dharmasamatā saiva srotaāpannānāṃ dharmasamatā yāvat saiva tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmasamatā. vilaksaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā katham ekalakṣaṇā yukteti? tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā rūpasya
XXadsp70-u:1907: [f. 307b] dharmatā nanu śūnyataiva sā. yā tathāgatānāṃ dharmatā nanu śūnyataiva sā?
XXadsp70-u:1909: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte śūnyatāyāṃ vilakṣaṇā dharmā
XXadsp70-u:1910: upalabhyante, yat rūpasya vilaksaṇaṃ vedanāyā saṃjñāyā yat saṃskārāṇāṃ yad vijñānasya yāvad yat tathāgatasya lakṣaṇaṃ?
XXadsp70-u:1912: bhagavān āha: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ. yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tatra na pṛthagjanā nānyatra pṛthagjanena. yāvan na tathāgato
XXadsp70-u:1914: (VIII 5,26) āha: kiṃ punar eṣā dharmatā saṃskṛtā atha asaṃskṛtā?
XXadsp70-u:1915: bhagavān āha: na saṃskṛtā na asaṃskṛtā, na ca saṃskṛta. vyatirikeṇa (AdSPG
XXadsp70-u:1916: II 134) asaṃskṛtaṃ labhyate. na ca asaṃskṛtavyatirikeṇa saṃskṛtam
XXadsp70-u:1917: upalabhyate. iti hi subhūte yaś ca saṃskṛtadhātur yaś ca asaṃskṛtadhātur
XXadsp70-u:1918: ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv nidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yaduta alakṣaṇau, tat punas tathāgato
XXadsp70-u:1919: lokavyavahāreṇa vyāhārati. na punaḥ paramārthena. na ca paramārthe kaścit kāyasaṃskāro vāksaṃskāro vā manaḥsaṃskāro vā. na ca anyatra kāyasaṃskārān na anyatra vāksaṃskārān na anyatra manaḥsaṃskārāt paramārtha upalabhyate.
XXadsp70-u:1920: yaiṣān dharmāṇāṃ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtānāṃ samatā sa paramārthaḥ, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthā ca na calati.
XXadsp70-u:1923: athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmasamatā prakṛtiśūnyā, tan na kasyacid dharmasya kiṃcit karoti.
XXadsp70-u:1924: ākiṃcaneṣu vā niṣkiṃcaneṣu vā dharmeṣu kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthāc ca na calati. sarvasattvānāṃ ca kāryaṃ
XXadsp70-u:1925: karoti. dānena priyavacanena arthakriyayā samānārthatayā ca?
XXadsp70-u:1926: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā bhāṣase. yac chūnyatā na sā kasyacit kiṃcit karoti. nākiṃcit. yadi subhūte ye te sattvāḥ svayam eva śūnyatāṃ jānīyur neyan tathāgatasya tathāgatavṛṣabhitā
XXadsp70-u:1927: bhavet. yac chūnyatāyāś ca na calati. sattvāṃś ca ātmasaṃjñāyā vivecayati vivecya śūnyatāyā mocayati saṃsārāt. evaṃ sattvasaṃjñāyā yāvat
XXadsp70-u:1928: kārakasaṃjñāyā rūpasaṃjñāyā yāvad vijñānasaṃjñāyā cakṣuḥsaṃjñāyā yāvan manaḥsaṃjñāyā pṛthivīdhātusaṃjñāyā yāvad vijñānadhātusaṃjñāyā saṃskṛtadhātusaṃjñāyā vivecayati. vivecya asaṃskṛtadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
XXadsp70-u:1932: bhagavān āha: sarvasaṃjñābhiḥ śūnyaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte yo nirmito
XXadsp70-u:1933: 'nyan nirmitaṃ nirmīyeta api nu tasya kiṃcid vastv asti yan na śūnyatā?
XXadsp70-u:1934: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ yan na nirmitasya. kiṃcid vastv asti yan na śūnyatā. yā ca śūnyatā yaś ca nirmita ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na
XXadsp70-u:1935: visaṃyuktāv ubhāv etau śūnyatāyā śūnyau. tat kiṃ vinigūhitam iyaṃ śūnyatā ayaṃ nirmitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāpy ubhayam etac chūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyante iyaṃ śūnyatā ayaṃ nirmita iti.
XXadsp70-u:1936: bhagavān āha: nāsti subhūte rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvan nirmitaṃ. yan na anirmitaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1937: āha: yadi bhagavann ime laukikā dharmā nirmitā, api nv ime lokottarā dharmāḥ nirmitā yaduta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvān samyakprahāṇāni.
XXadsp70-u:1938: catvārardhipādā. pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni. [f. 308a] /// trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
XXadsp70-u:1939: pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇika buddhadharmā, teṣāṃ ca phalaṃ yena teṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ prajñaptiḥ, srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy
XXadsp70-u:1940: arhan pratyekabuddhaḥs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ api nv ime dharmā nirmitā?
XXadsp70-u:1941: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā nirmitā, tatra kaścic chrāvaka
XXadsp70-u:1942: nirmitaḥ kaścit pratyekabuddha nirmitaḥ kaścid bodhisattva nirmitaḥ kaścit tathāgata nirmitaḥ kaścit kleśa nirmitaḥ (AdSPG II 136) kaścit karma nirmitaḥ, anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitopamā.
XXadsp70-u:1943: āha: yat punar idaṃ bhagavan prahāṇaṃ. srotaāpattiphalaṃ yāvad arhattvaṃ,
XXadsp70-u:1944: api nv ete dharmā. nirmitāḥ, pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā buddhabhūmir vā
XXadsp70-u:1945: sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇāṃ. api nv ete dharmā nirmitā?
XXadsp70-u:1946: bhagavān āha: kecit subhūte dharmā, uṭṭhāpitā vā nirodhitā vā, sarve 'te
XXadsp70-u:1948: āha: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitaḥ?
XXadsp70-u:1949: bhagavān āha: yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa na nirmitaḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1951: bhagavān āha: asaṃmoṣadharmanirvāṇasamayaṃ dharmo na nirmitaḥ.
XXadsp70-u:1952: āha: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati. na ca dvayenopalabhyate na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyatā. tasmād bhagavann asaṃmoṣadharmanirvāṇaṃ nirmitaṃ bhaviṣyati.
XXadsp70-u:1953: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvaśūnyāḥ, te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kṛtāḥ, yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā tan nirvāṇaṃ.
XXadsp70-u:1954: subhūtir āha: ādikarmiko bhagavaṃ pudgalaḥ katham avavaditavyaḥ katham
XXadsp70-u:1956: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhūt paścād abhāvo bhaviṣyati iti. nātra subhūte bhāvo na abhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvaḥ.
